name: Caleb
description: One of only two spies who believed Israel could conquer Canaan. At 85, still demanded the hardest territory.

silencing-crowd.name: Silencing the Crowd
silencing-crowd.prompt: hand raised silencing fearful crowd before Moses - standing tall against the tide of doubt, eyes blazing with confidence, the one voice saying 'we can do this'

returning-with-grapes.name: The Giant Grapes
returning-with-grapes.description: Carrying massive grape cluster from Canaan
returning-with-grapes.prompt: carrying pole with enormous grape cluster between him and Joshua - the proof of the promised land's bounty, muscles straining with the weight, eyes bright with possibility

different-spirit.name: Different Spirit
different-spirit.prompt: standing alone while other spies cower - upright posture, determined jaw, the different spirit visible in his bearing, faith against fear

claiming-hebron.name: Give Me This Mountain
claiming-hebron.description: At 85, demanding Hebron with its giants
claiming-hebron.prompt: elderly but powerful warrior pointing at mountain fortress - gray-haired but strong, demanding the hardest territory, the giants' stronghold, still ready for battle

facing-giants.name: Facing the Giants
facing-giants.prompt: standing before towering Anakim warriors - dwarfed in size but not in spirit, sword drawn, the man who saw giants as conquerable

old-warrior.name: Still Strong
old-warrior.prompt: standing in full battle gear at 85 - weathered face, strong body, sword in hand, the warrior who time could not diminish
